Text:
WOW!
EXCELLENT IDEA! EXCELLENT TOPIC! Thank you so much. The Truth and people who actually STUDY what is written and NOT what is assumed and traditional!

THANK YOU!!!!

Please seed if you like the programs.  I have been uploading these classes to thousands of people from all over the world over the last 2 years, and it can be very slow for them without the help of other seeders.

Thanks for your help, and God bless you too.

Little Fingers, you are simply incorrect here. Please show me where Jesus ridiculed the OT and taught a new kind of teaching? You think you understand the Bible, but you don't. Jesus says that HE REVEALS the Holy Scriptures to those who seek Him. Your little mind is not good enough to understand it. You need to have a relationship with the author in order to. The language of the Bible is righteousness, without which you cannot understand it.
